sentences.sentence: The government has set up a committee under the chairmanship of Professor Roy Goode.
sentences.translation: 该政府成立了一个委员会，由罗伊·古德教授担任主席。

sentences.sentence: He made a renunciation of his chairmanship.
I also want to thank Donald for his excellent chairmanship.
sentences.translation: 我也要感谢唐纳德精彩的主持。
